languages.text: "Далее... Ответчику было оказано беспрецедентное доверие со стороны Адептус Арбитес и Администратума. {mf|Ему|Ей} были вверены координаты мира, где складировалась десятина всего Простора Коронус. Согласно договоренности, приговоренн{mf|ый|ая} обязал{mf|ся|ась} перевезти священную плату на Даргонус, но как {mf|он|она} поступил{mf||а}?..."

"Moving on... The defendant was placed in an unprecedented position of trust by the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum. {mf|He|She} was entrusted with the coordinates of the world where the tithe of the entire Koronus Expanse was held. As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"
languages.original_text: "Далее... Ответчику было оказано беспрецедентное доверие со стороны Адептус Арбитес и Администратума. {mf|Ему|Ей} были вверены координаты мира, где складировалась десятина всего Простора Коронус. Согласно договоренности, приговоренн{mf|ый|ая} обязал{mf|ся|ась} перевезти священную плату на Даргонус, но как {mf|он|она} поступил{mf||а}?..."

As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"

"Moving on... The defendant was placed in an unprecedented position of trust by the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum. {mf|He|She} was entrusted with the coordinates of the world where the tithe of the entire Koronus Expanse was held. As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"

languages.text: "Ich fahre fort ... {mf|Der|Die} Angeklagte hat innerhalb des Adeptus Arbites und des Administratums enormes Vertrauen genossen. {mf|Ihm|Ihr} waren die Koordinaten der Welt anvertraut worden, auf der der Zehnt der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung aufbewahrt wurde. Vereinbarungsgemäß sollte {mf|der|die} Angeklagte den heiligen Tribut nach Dargonus transportieren, aber was hat {mf|er|sie} getan?"
languages.original_text: "Moving on... The defendant was placed in an unprecedented position of trust by the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum. {mf|He|She} was entrusted with the coordinates of the world where the tithe of the entire Koronus Expanse was held. As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich fahre fort ... {mf|Der|Die} Angeklagte hat innerhalb des Adeptus Arbites und des Administratums enormes Vertrauen genossen. {mf|Ihm|Ihr} waren die Koordinaten der Welt anvertraut worden, auf der der Zehnt der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung aufbewahrt wurde. Vereinbarungsgemäß sollte {mf|der|die} Angeklagte den heiligen Tribut nach Dargonus transportieren, aber was hat {mf|er|sie} getan?"

languages.text: « Poursuivons... L'{mf|accusé|accusée} a bénéficié d'une confiance sans précédent de l'Adeptus Arbites et de l'Administratum en se voyant confier les coordonnées du monde abritant la dîme de toutes les Étendues de Koronus. Comme convenu, l'{mf|accusé|accusée} devait y acheminer le tribut sacré de Dargonus, mais qu'a-t-{mf|il|elle} fait ? »
languages.original_text: "Moving on... The defendant was placed in an unprecedented position of trust by the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum. {mf|He|She} was entrusted with the coordinates of the world where the tithe of the entire Koronus Expanse was held. As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"

traits.locale_text: « Poursuivons... L'{mf|accusé|accusée} a bénéficié d'une confiance sans précédent de l'Adeptus Arbites et de l'Administratum en se voyant confier les coordonnées du monde abritant la dîme de toutes les Étendues de Koronus. Comme convenu, l'{mf|accusé|accusée} devait y acheminer le tribut sacré de Dargonus, mais qu'a-t-{mf|il|elle} fait ? »

languages.text: “我们继续吧……法务部与内政部对被告给予了前所未有的信任，告知被告机密世界的坐标，整个科罗努斯扩区的什一税都储存在那个世界。按照协议，被告应该把神圣什一税运送到达戈努斯，但{mf|他|她}实际上又做了什么呢？”
languages.original_text: "Moving on... The defendant was placed in an unprecedented position of trust by the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum. {mf|He|She} was entrusted with the coordinates of the world where the tithe of the entire Koronus Expanse was held. As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"

traits.locale_text: “我们继续吧……法务部与内政部对被告给予了前所未有的信任，告知被告机密世界的坐标，整个科罗努斯扩区的什一税都储存在那个世界。按照协议，被告应该把神圣什一税运送到达戈努斯，但{mf|他|她}实际上又做了什么呢？”

languages.text: «Continuemos... {mf|El|La} acusad{mf|o|a} obtuvo una posición de confianza sin precedentes por parte del Adeptus Arbites y el Administratum. Se le confiaron las coordenadas de un mundo en el que se almacenaba el diezmo de la Extensión de Koronus al completo. Como se acordó, {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a} debía transportar el santo tributo a Dargonus, pero ¿qué fue lo que hizo?».
languages.original_text: "Moving on... The defendant was placed in an unprecedented position of trust by the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum. {mf|He|She} was entrusted with the coordinates of the world where the tithe of the entire Koronus Expanse was held. As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"

traits.locale_text: «Continuemos... {mf|El|La} acusad{mf|o|a} obtuvo una posición de confianza sin precedentes por parte del Adeptus Arbites y el Administratum. Se le confiaron las coordenadas de un mundo en el que se almacenaba el diezmo de la Extensión de Koronus al completo. Como se acordó, {mf|el|la} acusad{mf|o|a} debía transportar el santo tributo a Dargonus, pero ¿qué fue lo que hizo?».

languages.text: 「話を続けましょう…被告は高等裁定局と帝国行政局から前例のない信頼のおける地位を与えられていました。被告には、コロヌス・エクスパンス全域の租税が保管されている惑星の座標が託されていました。取り決め通り、被告は聖なる租税をダルゴナスへ輸送することになっていましたが、被告は何をしたのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Moving on... The defendant was placed in an unprecedented position of trust by the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum. {mf|He|She} was entrusted with the coordinates of the world where the tithe of the entire Koronus Expanse was held. As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"

traits.locale_text: 「話を続けましょう…被告は高等裁定局と帝国行政局から前例のない信頼のおける地位を与えられていました。被告には、コロヌス・エクスパンス全域の租税が保管されている惑星の座標が託されていました。取り決め通り、被告は聖なる租税をダルゴナスへ輸送することになっていましたが、被告は何をしたのですか？」

languages.text: "Devam ediyoruz... Sanık, Adeptus Arbites ve Administratum tarafından eşi benzeri görülmemiş bir güven makamına getirilmiştir. Yapılan anlaşma gereği, Dargonus'a nakliye edilmek üzere bütün Koronus Enginliği'nin kutsal aşarının muhafaza edildiği dünyanın koordinatları, sanığın şahsına emanet edilmiştir. Peki kendisi ne yapmıştır?"
languages.original_text: "Moving on... The defendant was placed in an unprecedented position of trust by the Adeptus Arbites and the Administratum. {mf|He|She} was entrusted with the coordinates of the world where the tithe of the entire Koronus Expanse was held. As agreed, the defendant was to transport the sacred tribute to Dargonus, but what did {mf|he|she} do?"

traits.locale_text: "Devam ediyoruz... Sanık, Adeptus Arbites ve Administratum tarafından eşi benzeri görülmemiş bir güven makamına getirilmiştir. Yapılan anlaşma gereği, Dargonus'a nakliye edilmek üzere, bütün Koronus Enginliği'nin kutsal aşarının muhafaza edildiği dünyanın koordinatları, sanığın şahsına emanet edilmiştir. Peki kendisi ne yapmıştır?"
